text: Tomato soup was delicious and we loved the bread that came with it. Carbonara was very nice and creamy. Truffle fries came with mayo which we really liked as well. Service was a bit slow but servers were nice and friendly. We love coming here when we are at terminal 4.

Waiting for our flight, so we got a coffee to enjoy the ambiance at this cafe. The coffee is amazing, very rich and smooth, and the two gentlemen Akif and Muhaimim on duty were extremely kind and thoughtful and gave my mother a cup of warm water because she was cold. We'll be sure to visit again next time we are here! ðŸ˜Š

Came back after delayed return flight for late lunch, food was excellent, and the staff on duty were again very friendly and thoughtful. Great experience. Enjoyed the mud pie dessert as well. ðŸ˜ƒ
Food and coffee were poor in quality. Service was slow as the restaurant was understaffed. Tricky if you are rushing for a flight. Nice environment though.

Spacious cafe.
Breakfast is good.
Wafer come with the chicken is nice, the grilled chicken skin doesn't look like grilled.

This might be the best breakfast Iâ€™ve ever had in an airport. The presentation and quality of food is superb, the service was excellent especially Akin and albin, their service is a five star. They are very kind and hospitable. This place is recommendable.
